name: SaveTheDay
description:
SaveTheDay

This is my first game jam ever!! im glad finished on 48 hour.

This is simple game, the main goal is about watering Plant to help them growUp  first plant on base, second one on second floor and third one on thrid floor .

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this game actually have a videos on it but due to bug unity3d on WEBGL Build. the Html5 cant be played, so ? download the windows version instead WEBGL.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control :
A/D => move left and right
Space => for jump

LMB => right hand controller

Q =>  grab

there is no exit and pause button  ;'D. also there lot bug ahaha ,bug is feature thoo :3

This game is  for Weekly Game Jam - Week 166
Theme : Root
